content:
I apologize for that. Here is an updated list of the art forms we discussed earlier, along with an approximate price range for a medium-sized artwork in Indian rupees:

1. Warli art: ₹1,500 - ₹11,000
2. Madhubani art: ₹3,500 - ₹21,000
3. Rajasthani art: ₹6,000 - ₹30,000
4. Pattachitra art: ₹7,000 - ₹42,000
5. Applique work: ₹10,000 - ₹55,000
6. Chhau dance: As a performance art, the cost of watching a Chhau dance performance can vary depending on the venue, location, and popularity of the performers. Tickets may range from ₹750 to ₹7,500 or more, depending on the circumstances.
7. Terracotta art: ₹15,000 - ₹75,000
8. Dokra art: ₹18,000 - ₹1,10,000

Please note that these are rough estimates and the actual cost of a medium-sized artwork in any of these art forms can vary depending on the complexity, materials used, and the reputation of the artist. Additionally, prices can vary based on the location and market where the artwork is being sold.
